/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, a tall tower pierces the sky, standing as a testament to Beijing's modernity. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens effect, adding a unique perspective to the urban landscape.
